alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 20 at 8:34PM PDT until July 21 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 5 to 9 feet. * WHERE...Orange County Coastal Areas and San Diego County Coastal Areas. Highest surf on exposed southwest facing beaches. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...An additional south swell will maintain higher than normal surf along south facing beaches into Thursday, mainly from far northern San Diego County and into Orange County.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas
